text: Timefluence collects data to operate effectively and provide you the best experiences with our Products.

We may share data with vendors working on our behalf, when required by law, to respond to legal process, to protect our customers, to protect lives, to maintain the security of our Products, and to protect the rights or property of Timefluence.

We also may use the data to communicate with you, for example, informing you about your account, security updates and Product information.
We may share data with vendors working on our behalf, when required by law, to respond to legal process, to protect our customers, to protect lives, to maintain the security of our Products, and to protect the rights or property of Timefluence.
Timefluence Products use "cookies", small text files that can be read by a web server in the domain that put the cookie on your hard drive.
We use cookies to help with signing in to your account or third-party integrated web sites that you authorize.
Timefluence uses the data we collect to provide you the Products we offer, which include using data to improve and personalize your experiences.
The information submitted by Indirect Customers is saved and can be viewed and modified by the associated Direct Customer.

This privacy statement explains what personal data we collect from you and how we use it.
We share your personal data with your consent or as necessary to complete any transaction or provide any Product you have requested or authorized.
